entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 9:12 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: N 37 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Local blowing snow. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except snowfall amount 15 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
